# Gear code

```{r}
library(ROracle)
library(mar)
con <- dbConnect(dbDriver("Oracle"))
lesa_veidarfaeri(con) %>% 
  collect(n = Inf) %>% 
  rename(gid = veidarfaeri) %>% 
  write_csv("data-raw/veidarfaeri.csv")
# This was then edited by hand and then saved (inst/codes/gear.csv)
```
